Properties

Available

Whether NativeTexture is in a usable state.

public virtual bool Available { get; }

Property Value

bool

BypassTextureUploadQueueing

By default, texture uploads are queued for upload at the beginning of each frame, allowing loading them ahead of time. When this is true, this will be bypassed and textures will only be uploaded on use. Should be set for every-frame texture uploads to avoid overloading the global queue.

public bool BypassTextureUploadQueueing { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

DisplayHeight

The height of this texture when drawn to the screen.

public float DisplayHeight { get; }

Property Value

float

DisplayWidth

Crop(RectangleF, Axes, WrapMode, WrapMode)

Crop the texture.

public Texture Crop(RectangleF cropRectangle, Axes relativeSizeAxes = Axes.None, WrapMode wrapModeS = WrapMode.None, WrapMode wrapModeT = WrapMode.None)

Parameters

cropRectangle RectangleF

The rectangle the cropped texture should reference.

relativeSizeAxes Axes

Which axes have a relative size in [0,1] in relation to the texture size.

wrapModeS WrapMode

The texture wrap mode in horizontal direction.

wrapModeT WrapMode

The texture wrap mode in vertical direction.

Returns

Texture

The cropped texture.

GetTextureRect(RectangleF?)

Computes the UV coordinates of a sub-area of this texture.

public virtual RectangleF GetTextureRect(RectangleF? area = null)

Parameters

area RectangleF?

A display-space area of this texture to compute the UV coordinates of.
The full area is used if not provided: (0, 0, DisplayWidth, DisplayHeight).

Returns

RectangleF

The UV coordinates of area in this texture.

SetData(ITextureUpload)

Queue a TextureUpload to be uploaded on the draw thread. The provided upload will be disposed after the upload is completed.
